channel.title: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events
channel.description:
[Img]http://rebirthrsps.com/img/welcome_logo.png[/img] (Update is in comments)
First of all I would like to thank you for taking a look at our advertisement. I hope you come and check us out!
We have a give away once we have enough people, We are really close to hitting that mark!! Come and join us before you miss out! www.rebirthrsps.com The giveaway is about to be drawn get in before it is too late!
We are a fairly new server which updates frequently and runs 24/7. We are getting ready to do a Christmas event (yes in January) as we missed it in DEC. We have a working high scores as well if you are the competitive type. The list below is just some things that are in the server.
Custom whips Colored robins, and staff of light Ring (i)'s New bossing system added (can clan boss or solo your choice) Good xp rates (kind of a grind but not bad) Player based economy Normal slayer tasks and boss slayer tasks (boss tasks give 7 points) Bossing shop & slayer shop All skills except for construction and summoning (could be added later on) Completionist and Max cape Bonus xp weekends Quests (new ones being added) Random events to earn points to spend at event shop Achievable titles Place to reset combat skills to level 1 (or an indivdual combat skill) Ancient avatar rift Boxing arena Lottery Crystal key chest
Upcoming updates: New skill, new agility areas
Some videos / Photos Video: https://youtube.com/watch?v=Db82s9DJZHo
Old Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-Bg-7auMYs
Bossing system Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n-QCDl3VVfg
Random command event: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/ab3sxs.png[/img]
Event point shop [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/68wsn4.png[/img]
Daily task (available every 3 hours) [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/ddzxh4.png[/img]
Quests [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/e6ocxk.png[/img]
Completionist cape requirements [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/fyhb3k.jpg[/img]
Max cape requirements [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2l9l9xf.png[/img]
Pc: [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/303aghs.png[/img]
Barrows: [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/qyzvw8.png[/img]
(will upload more photos later today)
Hope to see some of you on the server, if any questions just let me know and I will do my best to answer them. To download our desktop client or play our web-client go to http://rebirthrsps.com/play/ Ill update thread as often as possible!

item.title: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

The server itself looks relatively generic. But it may gain players since that’s the sort of things people like in a server.

Read full topic
item.source: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events

item.title: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events
item.dc:creator: @im_buggin im buggin
item.description:
@im_buggin wrote:

We have added some new things into the server such as new bosses that are
Tormented demons
Nomad
skeleton horror

We have updated our barbarian assault mini-game, and re did avatar rift, and added in a PVM rift.

We also have new items such as steadfast, ragefire, glaiven boots, an anti - poison totem, Celestrial armour, dragon claws, cavefish and rocktails, and some other items that I can’t think of at the moment.

We have a revamped hunter system it is 20x better than our old one. You can now profit from hunting and gain clue scrolls if your lucky and get some other new items, also we added in bonfires to make firemaking a little better to do.

We have also added in bank tabs.

New events have also been added, along with a quest.

Video that shows some of the new things:
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Db82s9DJZHo[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.title: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The forum link on this thread needs to be fixed. And the first thing I noticed from the forums (while still assuming these forums were just put together) is that the basics of the forum haven’t been done such as renaming the community name (where it shows what the site name is in the tab area of the browser, yours states Invision Power Board), your crowns need to be redone as they’re not the right pixels to be aligned with the usergroup name (can be seen clearly on the moderation team page), and the colors used for the groups compared to what crowns are used are ridiculous.

Other than that, I can see the section and boards of the forum are basic but work with a starting community - nice job. I really don’t have feedback on the server as I’m not really a server kind of person but nonetheless, I wish the best of luck. You could also work with finding a new, unique theme or making one.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.source: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events

item.title: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events
item.dc:creator: @Coont Coont
item.description:
@Coont wrote:

Found this server yesterday and I instantly fell in love. With it’s many unique features other servers do not have, It also gives the nostalgic feeling of 2007 era. The staff are impressively generous with their knowledge and are extremely easy to get along with. Like all other servers it does have it’s downsides, but what do you expect from a newer server? (Even though it has its downsides, it’s coded extremely well with barely any bugs) I would definitely recommend this server to anyone who loves the old styled Rs or anyone who enjoys a good 'ol time!

Read full topic
item.source: Rebirth Rsps 317 24/7 Skilling, pking, and PVM (old school) New items + events

First of all I would like to thank you for taking a look at our advertisement. I hope you come and check us out!

We have a give away once we have enough people, We are really close to hitting that mark!! Come and join us before you miss out! www.rebirthrsps.com

We are a fairly new server which updates frequently and runs 24/7. We are getting ready to do a Christmas event (yes in January) as we missed it in DEC. We have a working high scores as well if you are the competitive type. The list below is just some things that are in the server.
